thread.section_title: Goldline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldline | www.goldline.com | 5 of 181
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I made my first purchase from them in 2008, second in 2010 and now my third this year 2017. Each time was very informative and my consultant this time Gerry McMillan was even more so. We spent almost an hour on the phone.
He really explained things and some of Goldline's policy's that had improved from my previous purchases. He also suggested different ways to increase my purchase power.
So when the time comes to acquire more there is only one firm and one account executive I will use and that is GOLDLINE and Gerry McMillian
